entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't install tool with version containing a capital letter on Linux #33580
  • NETSDK1206 should not be flagging 'browser' RID platform #33579
    .NET 8.0
  • "dotnet run" not correctly handling Chinese characters input via Console.ReadLine() in Debug mode #33575
  • Build fails on Windows when using .net Core SDK 6.0.411 (6.0.18) but is OK with 6.0.408 (6.0.16) #33570

Closed

  • dotnet tools occasionally hang #30455
    Discussion
  • Cannot start clean .Net Maui project in Visual Studio for Mac #30817
  • dotnet tool restore doesn't make command available #30880
    Discussion
  • Trying to build with PublishAot=true on Mac ARM results in restore failure #28475
    8.0.1xx
  • Add support for `--disable-build-servers` to more MSBuild-driven commands #31651
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2209740 #33590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move wait and result calls to the thread pool to avoid deadlocks. #33586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make non-portable RID warning check all available NETCore.App RIDS for the current TFM #33584
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Remove redundant SourceBuildTrimNetFrameworkTargets property #33572
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2209685 #33564
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • don't install older runtimes on arm64 architectures as they aren't supported #33515
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `--disable-build-servers` to Run and Store CLI commands #33445
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • adjust item templates to langVersion changes in Roslyn #33576
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.3.2 to 20.4.0 in /eng/dependabot #33574
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.3.2 to 20.4.0 in /eng/dependabot #33573
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Updated

  • Support for DisableDiagnosticTracing to suppress TRACE #22883
    Area-Infrastructure
  • GenerateRuntimeConfig now uses stream serialization instead of loading file in memory #22576
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Rocky Linux support #21029
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable the task unit test projects in helix and apply fixes to them. #33184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33468
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] containers: split `Registry.cs` and made it testable #33536
    Area-Containers
  • [main] fix typo #33508
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Handle Uri-less Realms during basic auth, and fix auth lookups for hosts with ports specified #32371
    Area-Containers
